name: Staller v. Staller et al., Appellants

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
parties: Staller v. Staller et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Affirmed on tbe opinion of tbe Superior Court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: 8. H. Torehia, with him Ralph R. Behney, M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellants.
John B. Marlin, Joseph Read, Jr., and Duane, Morris & Reokseher, for appellee, were not beard.
casebody.head_matter:
Staller v. Staller et al., Appellants.
Argued May 26, 1941.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
8. H. Torehia, with him Ralph R. Behney, M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellants.
John B. Marlin, Joseph Read, Jr., and Duane, Morris & Reokseher, for appellee, were not beard.
June 30, 1941:
